question: When the water is cold Sophie swims a kilometer in 10 minutes. When the water is warm Sophie swims a kilometer in 9 minutes more than twice as long. How much longer does Sophie take to swim 7 kilometers on a hot day than a cold day?
answer:
Cold water kilometer = <<10=10>>10 minutes
Warm water kilometer = 9+2*10=29 minutes
7 kilometers in cold water: 7(10)=<<7*10=70>>70 minutes
7 kilometers in warm water: 7(29)=<<7*29=203>>203 minutes
Sophie takes 203-70=<<203-70=133>>133 minutes longer
#### 133
